body.name: SmartMouth Package with Dry Mouth Activated Mouthwash - 16 Fl Oz, Soothing Mint & Dry Mouth Dual-Action Mints - 50 Count, Mellow Mint
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 8 mins
features: Dental Hygiene Mints & Mouthwash: Use the dry mouth relief mints and the bad breath mouthwash together for best results
Dry Mouth Mouthwash for Adults: Rehydrate your mouth with the activated mouthwash that aids against oral irritation and supports dental health
Sugar-Free Mints: These bad breath mints contain xylitol to aid the natural process of producing saliva for fresh breath
Dry Mouth Products: The alcohol-free mouthwash and breath mints both contain zinc to aid against bad breath and support fresh breath
SmartMouth Oral Hygiene: SmartMouth is your partner in bad breath prevention; the power of zinc supports fresh breath
body.description: Keep up your dental hygiene with a dual package from SmartMouth. This dry mouth package includes SmartMouth Dry Mouth Dual-Action Mints and Dry Mouth Activated Oral Rinse to aid against the discomfort of dry mouth.The sugar-free mints contain xylitol to support saliva production for fresh breath. These mints for adults support a healthy mouth and fresh breath. Containing zinc, these breath mints can be taken throughout the day to support fresh breath that lasts.Combine the fresh mints with the SmartMouth Dry Mouth Activated Oral Rinse. The mouthwash for oral health aids against dry mouth. This breath freshener supports rehydration of your mouth and aids against oral irritation. This mouthwash for adults contains zinc to support against bad breath and aid fresh breath. You can use this dental hygiene dry mouth rinse twice per day. Feel good about your breath as you go through the day.Beating bad breath means dealing with the real source of bad breath—sulfur gas. If you are serious about dealing with bad breath, nothing works better than activated zinc ion technology. The SmartMouth dual formula combines a sulfur eliminator and a zinc ion activator to release billions of zinc ions. Activated SmartMouth products aid against existing sulfur gas and the production of new sulfur gas for 12 hours. SmartMouth is the only activated formula that deals with the real source of bad breath for a full 24 hours. For best results, use SmartMouth products in the morning for a full 12 hours of clean breath, and use them again before bed to prevent morning breath.SmartMouth Oral Health Laboratories manufactures and markets SmartMouth branded mouthwash, toothpaste, and mints through national retailers and online. Headquartered in St. Louis, Missouri, SmartMouth has been working to end bad breath once and for all since 1993.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #63,161 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #302 in Mouthwashes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I liked the xylitol/zinc mints
reviews.reviewText: The liquid product not as much. Dyes in the formula

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars get a paperclip to bust the holes in the top.
reviews.reviewText: My biggest problem is the bottle. I wish they could have 1 pouring spout. I seem to always have trouble in the beginning. I have to get my trusty paper clip I bent and poke the hole THROUGH. Once I do that it always works great. No problems. I believe it is a great product just comes very hard to open and get going. It asked about traveling. I'd never do it. You will have it all over everything. I don't think the cap is sturdy enough to keep it from going all over everything. I love it though. I buy it over and over again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mixed Reviews on this one!
reviews.reviewText: What I like about this is that it does last, the taste isn't great but it works. What I don't like all that much is it does not travel well and leaked all over the inside of my bag! The self-containing cup in the lid that mixes the two formulas together doesn't stay on tight and the 2 mixes going into it don't pour out equally. These are the reasons that I said it is a mixed review. While it works, they really need to come up with a better design for mixing it and keeping it from leaking all over. As for what it does that is why I still spend the money on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more dry mouth!
reviews.reviewText: If you suffer from dry mouth you will love this mouth wash! No more dry mouth! It makes your mouth feel so refreshed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Provides good freshness, not much drymouth relief.
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash and mints provide good freshness, not much dry mouth relief in my opinion. The mints and mouthwash have a fresh minty taste, but I was hoping they would provide a better feeling in my mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The fluids don’t disperse evenly.
reviews.reviewText: When I tip the container to pour into the cup I don’t get both products. I have to put my finger over one side and almost turn the bottle completely upside down to get the other product to disperse. Great concept, but epic failure when it comes to using the product. I won’t purchase again. I’m sure it is effective if you can use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth Every Penny
reviews.reviewText: I used Smart Mouth for several months and when I went to get my teeth cleaned there was little bleeding. The cleaning went well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I suffer from severe dry mouth, and I used this product on a regular basis because it was the only product that really helped my condition. Then, all of a sudden it was taken off the market, and I used another dry mouth product without the same success. I was elated when I found Smart Mouth on Amazon. I will keep ordering it.Thank you, Amazon.
